create or replace PACKAGE pdm_ote_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table pdm_operation_types
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:40:59)

-- Generated global constants
g_con_pack        CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(30) := 'PDM_OTE_TAPI_PCK';
g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'PDM_OPERATION_TYPES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION ote_select_row( i_ote_ID   IN  pdm_operation_types.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_ote   OUT pdm_operation_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ote_select_row_uk1( i_ote_OPERATION   IN  pdm_operation_types.OPERATION%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ote  OUT pdm_operation_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ote_select_row_upd( i_ote_ID   IN  pdm_operation_types.ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_ote   OUT pdm_operation_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION ote_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ote_OPERATION   IN  pdm_operation_types.OPERATION%TYPE
                               , o_rt_ote  OUT pdm_operation_types%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE ote_lock_row( i_ote_ID   IN  pdm_operation_types.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE ote_lock_row_nowait( i_ote_ID   IN  pdm_operation_types.ID%TYPE )
;


END pdm_ote_tapi_pck;
/




package body pdm_ote_tapi_pck
is




function ote_select_row( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type
                       , o_rt_ote   out pdm_operation_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ote ( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from pdm_operation_types ote
            where ote.id = i_ote_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ote( i_ote_id => i_ote_id );
         fetch c_ote into o_rt_ote;
         l_found := c_ote%found;
         close c_ote;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ote%isopen
         then
            close c_ote;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ote_select_row;

function ote_select_row_uk1( i_ote_operation   in  pdm_operation_types.operation%type
                           , o_rt_ote  out pdm_operation_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ote ( i_ote_operation   in  pdm_operation_types.operation%type )
      is
         select *
           from pdm_operation_types ote
          where ote.operation = i_ote_operation ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_ote(i_ote_operation => i_ote_operation);
         fetch c_ote into o_rt_ote;
         l_found := c_ote%found;
         close c_ote;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_ote%isopen
      then
         close c_ote;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ote_select_row_uk1;

function ote_select_row_upd( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type
                           , o_rt_ote   out pdm_operation_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_ote ( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from pdm_operation_types ote
            where ote.id = i_ote_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_ote( i_ote_id => i_ote_id );
   fetch c_ote into o_rt_ote;
   l_found := c_ote%found;
   close c_ote;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_ote%isopen
      then
         close c_ote;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end ote_select_row_upd;

function ote_select_row_upd_uk1( i_ote_operation   in  pdm_operation_types.operation%type
                               , o_rt_ote  out pdm_operation_types%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := ote_select_row_uk1( i_ote_operation   =>  i_ote_operation
                                   , o_rt_ote => o_rt_ote );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := ote_select_row_upd( i_ote_id => o_rt_ote.id
                                      , o_rt_ote => o_rt_ote );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end ote_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure ote_lock_row( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_ote ( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from pdm_operation_types ote
              where ote.id = i_ote_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_ote_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                ote_lock_row_nowait( i_ote_id => i_ote_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_ote( i_ote_id => i_ote_id );
                  close c_ote;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_ote%isopen
         then
            close c_ote;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end ote_lock_row;

procedure ote_lock_row_nowait( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.ote_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_ote ( i_ote_id   in  pdm_operation_types.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from pdm_operation_types ote
               where ote.id = i_ote_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_ote_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_ote( i_ote_id => i_ote_id );

            close c_ote;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_ote%isopen
        then
           close c_ote;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_ote_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end ote_lock_row_nowait;


end pdm_ote_tapi_pck;
